actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, to grant eligibility for retired pay to reservists serving in an inactive status before August 16, 1945, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Grants eligibility for military retired pay to reservists of the Armed Forces serving in an inactive status before August 16, 1945. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1331(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, to grant eligibility for retired pay to reservists serving in an inactive status before August 16, 1945, and for other purposes.
